structure.unit: Chapter 8AA CABLE AND COMMUNICATIONS SERVICES PROVIDERS

text.section:
Sec. 8AA-32. Prior approval by County.
The licensee must comply at all times with all policies, procedures and directives of the Public Works Department. Except for individual service drops, the licensee shall not erect any pole, run any line, nor shall any construction on public property and related to the delivery of cable services be commenced without the prior approval of the Public Works Department.
